titleStmt.title: Batteries upon the kingdom of the devil seasonable discourses upon some common, but woful, instances, wherein men gratifie the grand enemy of their salvation / by Mr. Cotton Mather ...
titleStmt.author: Mather, Cotton, 1663-1728.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
Pages 183-end of book are lacking in filmed copy. Pages 170-end of book photographed from New York Public Library copy and inserted at end.
